cc.page.404.title: Page Not Found
cc.page.404.seo.title: 404 Not Found | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.404.seo.description: Oops, it looks like the page you were looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again. Crypto Metrics is a powerful tool that allows you to calculate the value of cryptocurrencies in real-time.
cc.page.main.seo.title: Main | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.main.seo.description: Calculate the value of your crypto holdings and keep track of your portfolio using Crypto Calculator. Get live prices for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other popular cryptocurrencies.
cc.page.calculateYield.seo.title: Calculate monthly yield | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.calculateYield.seo.description: Calculate your cryptocurrency investment returns with ease using our investment calculator. Enter your initial investment date, end date, and current date, as well as your monthly investment amount. Our smart search function allows you to easily add up to 5 coins to your portfolio, with a percentage distribution of your investment amount for each coin (e.g. 10% for BTC, 20% for ETH, etc., up to 100%).
cc.page.investmentCards.seo.title: Investment cards | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.investmentStatistics.seo.title: Investment statistics | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.investmentStatistics.seo.descrip: Use our crypto investment calculator to determine your potential earnings based on your initial investment, investment duration, and cryptocurrency allocation. Our smart search feature allows you to easily add up to 5 coins to your portfolio.
cc.page.login.seo.title: Log in | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.login.seo.description: Log in to Crypto Metrics and start calculating your cryptocurrency holdings.
cc.widget.mainContent.title: Cryptocurrency historical data calculator
cc.widget.mainContent.step1Description: Select the monthly investment amount, start date and end dater
cc.widget.mainContent.step2Description: Enter the title the coin you are interested in and select it
cc.widget.mainContent.step3Description: Allocate the monthly investment amount as a percentage for each coin
cc.entity.baseDescription.firstDescripti: Imagine that you started investing $100 monthly in DogeCoin in 2019. By May 2021 your capital would have grown to $500k.
cc.entity.baseDescription.secondDescript: With our service, you can make your list of coins for investment and see how profitable this portfolio would be.
cc.entity.baseDescription.thirdDescripti: With this information, you can decide if you should invest in crypto in the future in the same way.
cc.entity.baseDescription.tool.subtitle: Our tool will help you calculate:
cc.entity.baseDescription.tool.firstDesc: Profitability in $ and % for individual coins.
cc.entity.baseDescription.tool.fourthDes: Starting, average and last price for each coin.
cc.widget.loginForm.title: Log In
cc.widget.loginForm.step2.description: Enter code sent to your email
cc.page.code.title: An error has occurred
cc.page.code.seo.title: Confirm email | Crypto Metrics
cc.page.code.seo.description: Enter the code from the letter to enter Crypto Metrics.
cc.widget.calculateYieldForm.title: Calculation of profitability monthly investments in cryptocurrency
cc.widget.calculateYieldForm.step1.descr: Specify the monthly amount for investment, start and end date
Value must be an integer and be between 20 and 1000000.
cc.feature.periodAndAmount.startDateInpu: Date must be between 01/01/2013 and yesterday.
The end date must be greater than the start date or no greater than today's date.

cc.entity.selectedCoins.maxCoins: Сan select a maximum of {{count}} coins
cc.entity.selectedCoins.percentage: Specify the investment percentage for each selected coin (at least {{count}} percent per coin)
